name: Starship Troopers TC
summary: Taking place after the first film, you play as a veteran Mobile Infantry Elite Commando who generally goes into missions alone, rarely going into with actual backup, on Arachnid planets. Your first mission begins with escaping from Starhip Sparta, before landing to Kaliatho. The objectives were either to rescue officers, to investigate facilities that have lost contact, or to hold off against Arachnid assaults. The TC has new planets. They are Kaliatho, Gamma, Planet 3, and more.
